DashboardPage.title: Interactive Map
DashboardPage.description: Explore cultural routes and find interesting places.
DashboardPage.mapCardDescription: Interactive map for exploring routes and attractions.

RoutePlannerPage.title: Route Planner
RoutePlannerPage.description: Create your ideal route with AI assistance.
RoutePlannerPage.travelParamsDescription: Fill in your preferences to build a route.
RoutePlannerPage.fillFormPrompt: Fill out the form on the left, and AI will suggest a personalized route.
RoutePlannerPage.aiCreatedPrompt: Created by AI especially for you.
RoutePlannerPage.plannerErrorToastDescription: Failed to generate route. Please check your input and try again later.

JournalPage.title: Digital Journal
JournalPage.description: Record your impressions and create a travel report.
JournalPage.textareaPlaceholder: What's new today? Any thoughts, emotions, events?
JournalPage.noEntriesMessage: There are no entries in your journal yet.
JournalPage.startWritingPrompt: Start writing to save your memories!
JournalPage.entryAddedToastDescription: Your thoughts are saved in the journal.
JournalPage.noEntriesForReportToastDescription: Write something in the journal to create a report.
JournalPage.reportReadyToastDescription: Your final travel report is created.
JournalPage.reportErrorToastDescription: Failed to create report. Try again later.
JournalPage.entryDeletedToastDescription: The entry has been successfully deleted from the journal.

VoiceNotesPage.title: Voice Notes
VoiceNotesPage.description: Record your thoughts on the go and get AI transcription.
VoiceNotesPage.micAccessDeniedDescription: Please allow microphone access in your browser settings to record voice notes.
VoiceNotesPage.savedNotesDescription: Your previously recorded and transcribed voice notes.
VoiceNotesPage.noSavedNotesMessage: You have no saved voice notes yet.
VoiceNotesPage.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.
VoiceNotesPage.micPermissionErrorToastDescription: Please allow microphone access in browser settings.
VoiceNotesPage.checkingPermissionsToastDescription: Please wait while microphone access is being checked.
VoiceNotesPage.audioTranscriptionInProgressToastDescrip: AI is processing your recording. Please wait.
VoiceNotesPage.transcriptionErrorToastDescription: Failed to transcribe audio. Note saved with audio.
VoiceNotesPage.failedToStartRecordingToastDescription: Could not access microphone or start recording.

AiGuidePage.title: Interactive AI Guide
AiGuidePage.description: Ask questions about the route, attractions, and culture.

AiGuideChat.userPreferencesPlaceholder: E.g.: I love history, prefer vegetarian food, interested in active holidays...
AiGuideChat.initialPrompt: Ask your AI Guide a question!
AiGuideChat.initialPromptExample: For example: "What are some interesting places in the Rostov region?"
AiGuideChat.aiErrorToastDescription: Failed to get a response from the guide. Please try again later.
AiGuideChat.aiFallbackMessage: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage your account and application settings.
SettingsPage.appSettingsDescription: Various options to customize your experience will be available here.
SettingsPage.notificationsDescription: Manage push notifications and email alerts.
SettingsPage.otherSettingsComingSoon: Other settings will be available in future updates.

YandexMap.apiKeyMissingError: Yandex Maps API key not found. Please add NEXT_PUBLIC_YANDEX_MAPS_API_KEY to your .env file and restart the application.
YandexMap.apiObjectError: Yandex Maps API script loaded, but window.ymaps or window.ymaps.ready is undefined. This might be due to an invalid API key or network issues.
YandexMap.initError: Failed to initialize map. Please check console for details.
YandexMap.apiKeyNotSpecified: Yandex Maps API key is not specified. Please add NEXT_PUBLIC_YANDEX_MAPS_API_KEY to your .env file and restart the application.

RootLayout.title: EthnoTrack AI
RootLayout.description: Interactive cultural and auto-tourism platform with AI guides.
